section.title: Introduction
section.para: TorqueBox integrates with Infinispan a in memory data grid technology built under JBoss AS 7 and 100% open source initially written to Java Platform, allowing to make use of distributed cache across the cluster nodes, replacing JBoss Cache. It is automatically available to you with no additional configuration to start working with data grids.

Infinispan operates in four modes which determine how and where data will be stored: local, invalidation, replication and distribution, that a look here for more detailed description http://torquebox.org/2x/builds/html-docs/messaging.html#messaging-intro.
